page.title: 03Young Farmers
page.content: {YOUNG FARMERS. }The organisation is open to all from 12-25; Junior & Senior Sections, subscriptions being Â£3.50 & Â£7. A local group, approx. 60 is run by Committee, helped by retired members & local firms. Events such as Quizes, Sports, Public Speaking are organised at local & various compet- itions at Area & National level. Such events cost the members nothing save their own expenses. The Local Young Farmers hold weekly meetings covering a wide variety of topics. They hold an Annual Cheese & Wine Social, & a Dinner Dance both attended by parents & past members; a Carol Service followed by Punch & Mince Pies During the Summer months there are no meetings since all are involved in harvesting. Their motto is 'Good Farmers, Good Countrymen, Good Citizens'.
